name: IthacaCollegeOpera
0:
”Alexa, launch Ithaca College Opera”
”Alexa, play Ithaca College Opera”
”Alexa, ask Ithaca College Opera to play”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ithaca college opera
des: Ithaca College students and alumni tell their stories about the Ithaca College experience, with stories about the science behind levitation, a student’s campus life experience, hands-on physical therapy training, a student fashion designer’s art with a message, and a Grammy-nominated opera singer who shares his voice with students.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
